alert.note: Alert for Camden; Gloucester; Mercer; Middlesex; Northwestern Burlington; Salem; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 9:08AM EST until January 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations around one inch. * WHERE...Portions of northern to southern New Jersey, southeast Pennsylvania, northeast Maryland and northern Delaware. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions especially bridges and overpasses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will continue to change to snow from northwest to southeast this morning before tapering off early this afternoon. Temperatures will drop to near freezing, which may result in surfaces becoming icy.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Camden; Gloucester; Mercer; Middlesex; Northwestern Burlington; Salem; Western Monmouth
